feet.', ' Great schools are within one mile radius!', 'The versatile floor plan offers great scale and volumes of natural light create an open living experience at its optimal.', ' ', 'Two bedrooms in east west orientation and full bathroom all on one level.', '  Impressive fireplace adorns the luminous living room with expansive windows, inviting formal dining room host family and friends for all occasions.', ' The functional gourmet kitchen with ample cabinetry is ready for a chef to create and enjoy culinary delights.', 'Long table adjacent to kitchen windows is great fit for dining and/or work from home station.', ' Bonus space with sink and cabinets is a real big plus!', ' Soaring ceilings, gas central heat, hardwood/tile/vinyl floors.', ' Gas stove, refrigerator and window treatments included.', 'This is a duplex building with respectful resident on the top floor from unit 266 15th Ave, separate address, separate entry, separate PG&E meters.', ' The available flat/unit is above the ground level and ground level is not tenant occupied, approximate 1,378 sq ft living area.', ' Front section of back yard is common area to share use with resident at unit 266 15th Ave.  Utilities for water and sewer to split by total headcount, street parking, onsite laundry and hook up not are available however local cleaners and laundry are within walking distance on Clement Street and
